Title: Customer Intelligence Analyst
Description:
RetailSonar is a fast-growing SAAS company specializing in geomarketing for large retail and service companies. RetailSonar has offices already in 4 countries (Belgium, The Netherlands, France, Germany) and is technologically readiness for further scaling up toward European market leadership. Therefore we are looking for a Customer Intelligence Analyst to join our colleagues in the Dutch office in Utrecht.




Our unique RetailSonar platform is fed by state of the art AI technology and up-to-date marketdata, which is the base of our very accurate performance prediction.

RetailSonar is looking for suitable Dutch candidates to join its existing team of Customer Intelligence Analysts.




Your future colleagues have a great affinity with big data, data processing and predictive modelling. Our employees are true multitaskers: they work simultaneously on multiple projects at major retailers and service providers.




Your responsibilities:

Your daily tasks include validating and analysing customer data, platform configuration and building powerful predictive models.
You maintain frequent contact with the customers you work for.
Customer satisfaction is our number one priority. We achieve this by delivering high-quality end results and going the extra mile. Our analysts rise to any challenge and dare to think out-of-the-box.




Moreover, our employees are real team players: together, they always succeed in communicating the most important conclusions and insights to the client in a structured manner. Constructive feedback is important to us and we help each other to get the best out of ourselves. Every day again!




About you:

Preferably, you hold an master's degree in technical/economical or business area which is complemented by a master's degree in data technology (e.g. Data Science, Data Analytics, Business Informatics)
A first experience in a data driven position is a strong plus
You have a sharp, analytical mind
You have a passion for data processing (SQL, Excel, Access, SAS, ...)
You have enough courage, enthusiasm, persuasiveness and a corresponding language skill (NL-EN) to speak to the highest management at our (international) customers
A strong backbone that enables you to transform stressful situations into positive energy
A real team player who can also work well independently




What we have to offer:




A varied position with a steep and challenging learning curve in a particularly innovative and extremely exciting field within retail: geomarketing & customer intelligence.
A competitive salary package that is topped off every semester by a team bonus and individual bonus that encourage you to get the most out of yourself and your team.
The opportunity to be part of a young, close-knit and highly driven international team that enthusiastically builds successful, ground-breaking solutions.
A committed and personal organisation that values a good work-life balance.
A very personal coaching program that offers you ample opportunity to further explore your own interests.
The opportunity to work with executives and experts from the largest retail companies and governments. The ideal way to broaden your world.
Regular team events and trips to Belgium and beyond.

Show more
HTML:
RetailSonar is a fast-growing SAAS company specializing in geomarketing for large retail and service companies. RetailSonar has offices already in 4 countries (Belgium, The Netherlands, France, Germany) and is technologically readiness for further scaling up toward European market leadership. Therefore we are looking for a Customer Intelligence Analyst to join our colleagues in the Dutch office in Utrecht.


Our unique RetailSonar platform is fed by state of the art AI technology and up-to-date marketdata, which is the base of our very accurate performance prediction.

RetailSonar is looking for suitable Dutch candidates to join its existing team of Customer Intelligence Analysts.


Your future colleagues have a great affinity with big data, data processing and predictive modelling. Our employees are true multitaskers: they work simultaneously on multiple projects at major retailers and service providers.


Your responsibilities:

  • Your daily tasks include validating and analysing customer data, platform configuration and building powerful predictive models.
  • You maintain frequent contact with the customers you work for.
  • Customer satisfaction is our number one priority. We achieve this by delivering high-quality end results and going the extra mile. Our analysts rise to any challenge and dare to think out-of-the-box.


Moreover, our employees are real team players: together, they always succeed in communicating the most important conclusions and insights to the client in a structured manner. Constructive feedback is important to us and we help each other to get the best out of ourselves. Every day again!


About you:

  • Preferably, you hold an master's degree in technical/economical or business area which is complemented by a master's degree in data technology (e.g. Data Science, Data Analytics, Business Informatics)
  • A first experience in a data driven position is a strong plus
  • You have a sharp, analytical mind
  • You have a passion for data processing (SQL, Excel, Access, SAS, ...)
  • You have enough courage, enthusiasm, persuasiveness and a corresponding language skill (NL-EN) to speak to the highest management at our (international) customers
  • A strong backbone that enables you to transform stressful situations into positive energy
  • A real team player who can also work well independently


What we have to offer:


  • A varied position with a steep and challenging learning curve in a particularly innovative and extremely exciting field within retail: geomarketing & customer intelligence.
  • A competitive salary package that is topped off every semester by a team bonus and individual bonus that encourage you to get the most out of yourself and your team.
  • The opportunity to be part of a young, close-knit and highly driven international team that enthusiastically builds successful, ground-breaking solutions.
  • A committed and personal organisation that values a good work-life balance.
  • A very personal coaching program that offers you ample opportunity to further explore your own interests.
  • The opportunity to work with executives and experts from the largest retail companies and governments. The ideal way to broaden your world.
  • Regular team events and trips to Belgium and beyond.

Title: Data-analist
Description:
Data analist

Als Data analist (speaking dutch fluently) bij Ordina Sopra steria werk je aan gave uitdagende projecten in een divers team van collega-data analisten. Sla je de brug tussen de business, informatie en techniek. Jouw expertise en ambities vormen de basis voor onze High-Performance Teams (HPT's), waarin samenwerking en continue ontwikkeling centraal staan. Iedereen draagt bij vanuit zijn eigen vakmanschap en technologie. Zo blijf je van elkaar leren en sta je er dus nooit alleen voor.




Werken als Data analist bij Ordina Sopra steria

Je voert gesprekken als materie deskundige met stakeholders als beheerders, gebruikers en architecten.
Je brengt behoeften van stakeholders in kaart en vertaalt deze naar informatie oplossingen.
Je stelt gevalideerde requirements en specificaties op met de juiste kwaliteit en diepgang en prioriteert deze met de business.
Je bent het aanspreekpunt voor de organisatie en de scrumteams voor de inhoud en je bent als geen andere in staat om duidelijk over te brengen wat er gerealiseerd moet worden.




Waar jij komt te werken

Binnen de area Data cre√´ren wij duurzame waarde bij onze klanten op het gebied van data. Wij helpen bedrijven om wendbaar te blijven in de transitie door data en techniek onderdeel te laten zijn van zowel de dagelijkse operatie als ook de strategische besluitvorming. Hiermee helpen wij onze klanten de verandering voor te zijn met behulp van data. Het is onze ambitie om organisaties te laten excelleren met data. Je werkt in een hightech omgeving met focus op kennis en innovatie, een open no-nonsense bedrijfscultuur met ruimte voor eigen initiatief.




De area bestaat uit 5 practices: Data Governance & Data Management, Data Visualisation, Data Science & AI, Data Engineering & Data Migrations en Spatial Intelligence. Elk met een duidelijke signatuur en focus op inhoud en bijbehorende solution. Binnen deze area zijn ruim 170 professionals werkzaam in een voor hun logische en passende vakinhoudelijke practice.




Dit ben jij

Jij bent een enthousiaste en ondernemende professional die initiatief neemt en graag bijdraagt aan een collegiale werkomgeving. Je waardeert kennisdeling en samenwerking, en bent in staat om jouw idee√´n en inzichten te delen met collega's. Met een proactieve houding ben je gemotiveerd om samen met anderen innovatieve oplossingen te ontwikkelen. In onze organisatie krijg je de ruimte om je ondernemerschap te tonen en bij te dragen aan een cultuur waarin teamwork en continue ontwikkeling centraal staan.




Verder neem je mee:

Afgeronde HBO/WO opleiding
Tenminste 2 jaar ervaring met data-analyses en data-ontwerp
Affiniteit met data, datastructuren en datamapping
Kennis en ervaring met datamodelleren, relationele algebra en SQL
Beheersing van de Nederlandse taal




Waarom Ordina Sopra steria?

Naast uitdagende werkmogelijkheden, een open werkcultuur en leuke collega‚Äôs, bieden wij jou ook de vrijheid en flexibiliteit om je professionele doelen te behalen door een ruim aanbod aan trainingen aan te bieden. Daarnaast bieden wij ook de volgende andere punten:

Een vast contract
Basis salaris tussen de ‚Ç¨4000 en ‚Ç¨6500 o.b.v. 40 uur
Flexibele werkomgeving waar je zelfstandig tijd en plaats kunt bepalen
Mobiliteitsbudget met keuze voor een leaseauto of eigen vervoer
Flex benefit budget en collectieve regelingen
Keuze uit een MacBook Pro (inc Apple accessoires) of Windows laptop
Een betrokken community gericht op teambuilding, gaming en evenementen




Iedereen is welkom om te solliciteren. Wij geloven namelijk in de kracht van diversiteit en waarderen inclusie. De beste idee√´n en slimste oplossingen ontstaan immers in diverse teams. Daarom besteden we veel aandacht aan de samenstelling van onze high-performance teams. Zodat jij je thuis voelt en het beste uit jezelf kunt halen.




Ben je klaar om je carri√®re een boost te geven? Solliciteer dan direct voor de functie van Data analist bij Ordina sopra steria!

Title: Commercial Data & Reporting analyst
Description:
Commercial Data and Reporting Analyst (m/f/d)

Scope of Position:

The sales operations team drives sales efficiency globally, through metrics, training, CRM and cross functional alignment. Within this team, the role of the Commercial Data and Reporting Analyst is to serve as a bridge connecting internal/external customers with business related reports and information. Comfortable utilizing performance excellence tools, they also bridge the gap between business needs and technology solutions. Their primary focus is on leveraging PBI, Salesforce and other sales and reporting technologies to optimize and streamline business processes. They are playing an active role in transforming some of our current manual operation tools into automatic IT solutions. They should have a strong subject matter understanding of commercial operations processes, tools, and systems.

Day to Day Responsibilities:

Sales Incentive Plan processes
Administer sales incentive programs
Manage the day-to-day administration of sales incentive programs
This includes tracking performance metrics and ensuring that incentive data is accurate and up to date
Develop and maintain tools to drive annual budget cycle
Monthly build of data cube for SIP processing
Collaborate with Commercial Reporting team and Sales managers to identify new customers and update mapping files
Support quarterly transfer meeting with Sales managers and load subsequent, approved corrections
Coordinate escalations as required to resolve unapproved correction requests
Support quarterly reviews with Sales Leadership, HR, and Finance to share performance results and deeper analyses such as observed trends, themes, and potential focus areas that may lead to future plan optimization
Capture, troubleshoot, report out and correct any errors identified by sales managers
Provide training and support to the Commercial team on the use of IT Sales Incentive Planning systems
Collaborate with IT and the data analytics team to ensure the accuracy and integrity of sales data. Sales intelligence
Develop, manage, and communicate reporting and analytics critical to the commercial organization
Act as a liaison between business stakeholders and technical teams, translating business requirements into technical specifications
Work together with cross-functional teams, stakeholders, and IT professionals to gather, analyze, and document business requirements, ensuring the successful implementation and enhancement of solutions
Act as the subject matter expert for sales technology platforms, providing guidance and best practices to ensure optimal system performance and data integrity
Identifies gaps and provides technical expertise in business requirements for system functional specifications and scales new and current systems, processes, and procedures in a cost-effective manner

Education and experience requirement:

Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Business, Finance, Management of Information Systems, Systems Engineering
Technical education and experience in query tools, data compilation and manipulation for trend analysis and suggested solutions
3-5 years Data Analytics experience
Knowledge and experience with sales and sales processes (inclusive of Sales Incentive Plans)
Knowledge of CRM systems, ERP systems, and other sales-related software
Familiarity with Agile and Scrum methodologies
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills (customer focused, enabling, engaging)
Ability to work/build relationships in an international multi-cultural matrix organization
Results oriented, detailed oriented, rigorous, forward looking
Excellent analytical skills
Advanced knowledge of PowerBI, Power Query functionality and Excel




Travel Requirements: Minimal travel required

Hours of work/work schedule/flex-time: Monday ‚Äì Friday (40 hours/week)

Title: Senior Data Analyst - GTM (Remote Europe)
Description:
n8n is a low-code platform for workflow automation and AI app integration, designed for technical users. It simplifies connecting to any app or API and enables the incorporation of AI into business processes. n8n is Source Code Available and has a passionate and engaged community of builders!

We were founded end of 2019 and currently:

üßë‚Äçü§ù‚Äçüßë We're a diverse team of 60 talented people

üöÄ Our annual recurring revenue is growing 5x year-over-year

‚≠êÔ∏è With +44k GitHub stars, we are in the top 0.0001% most popular projects on Github

üå± We now count a total of $20m in funding: we were Sequoia's first seed investment in Germany, and most recently secured a Series A extension (February 2024)

MISSIONS

üéØ Your main goal will be to unlock insights that drive revenue growth and optimize sales & marketing efficiency at n8n.

To achieve this, you will:

1- Empower Marketing with actionable data insights

üîç Transform complex marketing data into accessible insights by optimizing our BigQuery setup and integrating with tools like Metabase

üìä Analyze campaign performance, demographic trends, and product telemetry to help the marketing team focus on high-impact areas

üîó Centralize and link additional data sources such as HockeyStack, Reo.dev, and Scarf to deepen our understanding of user behavior

2- Support RevOps and Sales with strategic analytics

üìà Build and maintain dashboards that provide real-time visibility into sales performance and marketing ROI

üõ†Ô∏è Run ad-hoc analyses to support sales strategies and inform RevOps decision-making

üß© Develop attribution models to map out customer journeys and identify key conversion points

3- Optimize SEO and content strategies with data science

üîó Leverage data science techniques to analyze node usage, SEO performance, and keyword strategies for maximum impact

üß† Provide actionable recommendations to enhance our online presence and content marketing efforts

üöÄ Explore new avenues for personalizing SEO strategies based on user interaction data

4- Proactively identify opportunities for growth

üå± Continuously explore new data sources and methodologies to unlock further growth opportunities

üß© Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure data-driven decision-making across the organization

üí° Be a proactive voice at the table, driving conversations on how data can further our ambitious goals

5- Drive data-driven decision making across GTM

üéØ Lead efforts to ensure data-driven decision-making becomes a core part of our GTM culture, empowering team members with the insights they need.

üìö Maintain and expand our GTM data documentation, ensuring consistency and accessibility for current and future team members.

üõ†Ô∏è Set up and manage the necessary tools, systems, and processes that streamline data access and analysis for GTM teams.

Requirements

Must-have

üõ†Ô∏è 5+ years of relevant experience: You have a proven track record in data analytics, data science, or business intelligence, particularly in a marketing context.

üíª Advanced SQL proficiency: You are skilled in complex queries, including aggregations, joins, and filters, and can make data accessible to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

üåê Expertise with Google Analytics, Tag Manager, and BigQuery: You can handle data sources, manage transformations, and deliver actionable insights from complex datasets.

üìä Experience with revenue/sales CRM systems (especially Salesforce): You understand how to integrate CRM data with marketing analytics to drive sales and revenue growth.

üéØ Focus on business impact: You have a strong ability to translate data into strategic recommendations that directly contribute to revenue growth and operational efficiency.

‚öôÔ∏è Pragmatic problem-solving skills: You are known for your bias for action and your ability to tackle complex challenges with practical solutions.

üîç Proactive and curious mindset: You continuously seek out opportunities for analysis, always asking 'why' to uncover deeper insights.

üìà Experience in early-stage data teams: You've successfully set up tools, systems, and processes in a fast-paced, growing environment.

Nice-to-have

üîó SEO and content marketing experience: You've worked with SEO datasets/tools and have a solid understanding of how to integrate these insights into broader marketing strategies.

üìä Data science/BI experience: You bring additional expertise in data science methodologies or business intelligence platforms, enhancing your ability to deliver sophisticated analyses.

n8n is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

We can sponsor visas to Germany; for any other country, you need to have existing right to work.


Our company language is English


You care about diversity and inclusion? We do too! Check out our Diversity, Inclusion and Belonging initiatives at n8n.*

Benefits

üí∏ Competitive compensation

üí™ Ownership: Our core value is to "empower others", and we give you a slice of n8n in the form of equity.

üèñÔ∏è Work/life balance: We work hard, but make sure everyone can properly recharge their batteries with 30 days holiday, plus public holidays wherever you are.

üìà Career growth: We are looking to hire 'rising stars', who can grow with the company into more senior roles. We give you ‚Ç¨1k a year to spend on courses, books, events and coaching, to support you in developing your career.

ü§© A passionate team: We love our product, and we have regular office hackathons to see who can build the coolest thing with it!

üåè Remote-first: Our team works remote from anywhere within Europe but we have regular off-sites to help build team bonds and alignment.

üôè Transparency: We all know what everyone's working on, how's the company doing ‚Äî the whole shebang.

ü§ù Giving back: We're big fans of open source, and you'll get $100 per month to support projects you care about.

üòç Ambitious but kind culture where people love to work - our eNPS for 2023 is 100!

Disclaimer: If you see the same job posting in different locations, it's because we're hiring remotely and are pushing it to several locations! We're currently only making one RevOps hire. Please do not apply twice for the same position.

üôè Transparency: We all know what everyone's working on, how's the company doing ‚Äî the whole shebang.

ü§ù Giving back: We're big fans of open source, and you'll get $100 per month to support projects you care about.

üòç Ambitious but kind culture where people love to work - our eNPS for 2023 is 100!

Disclaimer: If you see the same job posting in different locations, it's because we're hiring remotely and are pushing it to several locations! We're currently only making one RevOps hire. Please do not apply twice for the same position.

Title: Data Analyst (Freelance)
Description:
As a Data Analyst, you will have the exciting opportunity to collaborate closely with our dynamic teams and working on multiple tasks. You will play an important role in creating engaging and insightful data visualizations using Tableau, using advanced data analysis and modelling techniques to find valuable trends and patterns within our datasets. Your involvement in developing and maintaining data models, reports, and workflows will be crucial to our success. Furthermore, you will actively engage with various business units, gaining a deep understanding of their unique needs and creating customized dashboards and solutions to meet and exceed their expectations.

About The Project

You should be already based in The Netherlands

Duration: 2-3 months

The Project Contains 2 Parts Of Development


The backend (data warehouse ) using the in-house data centre to develop a solution from data collocation to structured database (in storge ) ,
The frontend (visualisation ) : using the structured database in storge with the Tableau we cerate advance models flows in addition to build the dashboard visualizations.


What are the expectations/requirements?

You are already based in The Netherlands


Re-creation of existing dashboard and visualizations from PowerBI to tableau.
Creating data models from database using tableau Prep for visualizations
Creating new deep dives upon request
Interacting with multiple stakeholders to understand their requirements and implementing them in their dashboards
Gaid and support the stakeholders to understand and unlock the potential dashboard
Creating appealing dashboards and visualization, knowledge of UXUI would be nice


Key Responsibilities


Collaborate with the data solutions team to design, develop, and implement data-driven solutions
Create interactive and insightful data visualizations using Tableau
Perform complex data analysis and modelling to uncover trends, patterns, and insights using Tableau prep and SQL.
Assist in the development and maintenance of data pipelines and workflows
Discuss with business units (clients) to understand their needs and create dashboards tailored to their expectations
Contribute to the documentation of processes, methodologies, and best practices
Participate in team meetings, brainstorming sessions, and project planning activities


Want to know more about us?

We are serving the Swiss market as Switzerland‚Äôs leading IT & Telecom company. Thus, we are actively driving digitalization and networking, and tapping new paths for our customers and our employees. We do not know what the future is going to look like, but we definitely have the opportunity to shape it. To do so we are and act trustworthy, committed and curious.

Since 2019, we have been building up the coolest DevOps Center with a wonderful office at the World Trade Center in the heart of Rotterdam. We are currently recruiting IT passionate professionals who are keen on developing high-quality software, have an agile mindset and appreciate collaboration with motivated colleagues from all over the world.

Title: BI Consultant
Description:
Randstad ‚Äì Tot ‚Ç¨6500 per maand ‚Äì Hybride werken, tot 50% vanuit huis

De vrijheid om je week zelf in te delen en tot 50% vanuit huis te werken. Een warm team consultants, kennissessies en wekelijks een gezamenlijke lunch in ons prachtige kantoor in Zeist. Daarnaast een jaarlijks opleidingsbudget van ‚Ç¨5000 voor jouw persoonlijke en professionele groei. Ons diverse team van data specialisten werkt aan uitdagende projecten voor uiteenlopende klanten. Interesse? Lees verder en ontdek hoe jij Adapt Analytics kunt versterken!




Wat jij gaat doen:

Als BI Specialist bij Adapt Analytics speel je een cruciale rol in het helpen van onze klanten om hun data optimaal te benutten. Je werkt aan uiteenlopende opdrachten bij onze klanten. Dit zijn vaak MKB-bedrijven of gemeenten, maar ook bij grote organisaties zoals Schiphol en de ING bank. Jouw werkzaamheden omvatten:

Data modelleren en analyseren om bedrijfsprocessen te verbeteren en waardevolle inzichten te genereren.
Schrijven van complexe queries in SQL en werken met tools zoals Azure Data Factory en PowerBI.
Adviseren van klanten over datastrategie√´n en het ophalen van requirements bij stakeholders.
Implementeren van data gedreven oplossingen en samenwerken in agile/scrum teams.




Waar je terecht komt:

Adapt Analytics helpt organisaties om data-gedreven te werken. Onze missie is om de behoeften van onze klanten concreet te maken en hen te ondersteunen in hun data-ambities. We zijn ambitieus en volop in groei, dit zorgt voor veel interne doorgroeimogelijkheden.

Wij hechten veel waarde aan een inclusieve cultuur waarin iedereen zich welkom voelt. Onze cultuur is uniek, ontspannen en gebaseerd op vertrouwen. Ons kantoor in Zeist is een inspirerende werkplek waar we wekelijks gezamenlijke lunches organiseren en waar regelmatig sociale en kennisactiviteiten plaatsvinden. Zo cre√´ren we een omgeving waar binding, collegialiteit hoof in het vaandel staan. Wij geloven in een leven lang leren, daarom faciliteren wij jaarlijks een opleidingsbudget van ‚Ç¨5000 voor jouw persoonlijke en professionele groei.




Wie jij bent:

Je hebt minimaal een Hbo-opleiding afgerond.
Je hebt werkervaring met SQL, data modeling en data visualisatietools zoals PowerBI, Tableau of Qlik.
Je beheerst zowel het Nederlands als het Engels uitstekend.
Je bent proactief, overtuigend en een goede gesprekspartner.




Wat wij bieden:

Direct een vast dienstverband.
Verdien tot ‚Ç¨6500,- bruto per maand excl. 8% vakantietoeslag.
Een ruim opleidingsbudget van ‚Ç¨5000 per jaar o.b.v. fulltime om jezelf doorlopend te ontwikkelen.
Een elektrische auto van de zaak (bijvoorbeeld een Tesla Model 3) of een alternatieve mobiliteitsvergoeding.
‚Ç¨500 bruto per jaar voor de inrichting van je thuiswerkplek.
Ontvang een percentage over je behaalde omzet.
26 vakantiedagen o.b.v. fulltime + 1 extra dag voor je verjaardag (√≥√≥k als die in het weekend valt).
Werk 2 tot 3 dagen per week vanuit huis, afhankelijk van jouw lopende opdracht.
Premievrije pensioenregeling.
Een prachtig kantoor in Zeist met wekelijks gezamenlijke lunches en diverse sociale en kennisactiviteiten.
Een cultuur van vrijheid en verantwoordelijkheid, waarin je de ruimte krijgt om je eigen idee√´n te realiseren en te groeien in je rol.




Hoe nu verder:

Ben jij de BI Consultant die we zoeken? Heb je een passie voor data en wil je deel uitmaken van een dynamisch en divers team? Stuur je CV en motivatiebrief naar anne@adapt.nl en word onderdeel van Adapt analytics! Voor vragen over deze vacature kun je contact opnemen met Anne, onze recruiter, via 06 1613 6164 of per mail. Tot snel!

Title: Data Analist
Description:
Wie is LEF?

Wij zijn d√© plek waar IT-professionals de kans krijgen om te innoveren en te werken aan de toekomst. De core-business van LEF is het ondersteunen van opdrachtgevers bij innovatieve vraagstukken op het gebied van IT. Wij zijn geen doorsnee IT-detacheerder. Nee, bij ons onderneem je mee, ontwikkel je mee en verdien je mee. Naast de uitdagende opdrachten heb je bij LEF namelijk de mogelijkheid om mee te bouwen aan de organisatie, door bijvoorbeeld mee te denken over het inrichten van ons talent management of het uitrollen van nieuwe diensten.




Wie zoeken wij?

Heb jij een passie voor data en wil je bijdragen aan het nemen van strategische beslissingen? Als Data Analist speel je een essenti√´le rol in een team van onze opdrachtgevers, waar je de kans krijgt om complexe datasets te doorgronden en waardevolle inzichten te genereren. Deze functie biedt jou de mogelijkheid om jouw analytische vaardigheden toe te passen en een impact te hebben op de koers van die organisaties.




Over de werkzaamheden:

Als Data Analist ben je verantwoordelijk voor:




Verzamelen, transformeren en opschonen van gegevens uit diverse bronnen om analyses mogelijk te maken;
Analyseren van datasets om trends en patronen te ontdekken en interpreteren van resultaten om datagestuurde aanbevelingen te doen;
Ontwikkelen en onderhouden van rapportages en dashboards om gegevens visueel te presenteren;
Samenwerken met verschillende teams zoals marketing, sales en productontwikkeling om databehoeften te begrijpen en te vertalen naar bruikbare inzichten;
Monitoren van datakwaliteit en zorgen voor nauwkeurigheid en consistentie van gegevens.




Wat maakt ons een fijne werkgever?

Wij bieden niet alleen een uitdagende en verantwoordelijke functie, maar ook:




Een dynamische werkomgeving waarin innovatie wordt aangemoedigd;
Mogelijkheden voor professionele en persoonlijk ontwikkeling en groei;
Je wordt onderdeel van een community, waar een teamgerichte cultuur heerst met ruimte voor eigen initiatief;
En wij de bieden de mogelijkheid om je mee te laten bouwen aan onze organisatie. Denk bijvoorbeeld mee over het inrichten van ons Talent Management of het uitrollen van nieuwe diensten.




Arbeidsvoorwaarden:

Bij LEF heb jij de regie over je eigen carri√®re en wij begrijpen dat iedereen unieke behoeften heeft. Daarom kan je gebruik maken van ons flexibel employee benefits programma, zodat je zelf kunt kiezen welke arbeidsvoorwaarden het beste bij jou passen. Kies je voor de standaard:




Bruto maandsalaris van ‚Ç¨3.500 tot ‚Ç¨7.500. Inclusief bonussen tot ‚Ç¨110.000 op jaarbasis
Riante bonussen en winstuitkering
25 vakantiedagen
8% vakantiegeld
Een goede pensioenregeling
Auto van de zaak
Laptop van de zaak
Direct een vast contract




Of heb je liever:




Bruto maandsalaris van ‚Ç¨3.500 tot ‚Ç¨7.500. Inclusief bonussen tot ‚Ç¨110.000 op jaarbasis
Riante bonussen en winstuitkering
30 vakantiedagen
10% vakantiegeld
Een goede pensioenregeling
Een fiets van de zaak
Een laptop van de zaak
Een sportabonnement
Direct een vast contract




Dan is dat ook zeker mogelijk.




Functie-eisen:

Een afgeronde opleiding op hbo-niveau of hoger, bij voorkeur in een technische richting;
Minimaal 3 jaar ervaring als Data Analist;
Ervaring met SQL;
Ervaring met data visualisatietools zoals Power BI;
Ervaring met programmeertalen zoals Python of R is een pr√©;
Sterke analytische en een ondernemende instelling;
Vloeiende beheersing van de Nederlandse taal, zowel mondeling als schriftelijk.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
The job

As a Data Analyst, you will play a crucial role in making data accessible and understandable across the company. Your key responsibilities will include:


Developing and managing dashboards and analyses to support strategic business initiatives using PowerBI and Databricks.
Conducting exploratory data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and actionable insights.
Collaborating with internal stakeholders to understand their data needs and translating these into impactful solutions.
Contributing to cross-functional projects and initiatives within the Network team.
Ensuring data quality by working with data engineers to establish custom data quality rules and validations.
Leading projects and mentoring junior team members to foster continuous learning and improvement.



Who We‚Äôre Looking For:


You hold an MSc in mathematics, econometrics, statistics, data science, or a related field.
You have at least 5 years of experience in data analysis, with proficiency in SQL and hands-on experience with Databricks and PowerBI.
You possess strong analytical, strategic, and storytelling skills, with the ability to communicate complex data effectively.
You excel in building relationships and working collaboratively with stakeholders at all levels.
Experience with Dynamics 365 CRM and knowledge in logistics, navigation, or fleet management is a plus.
You are eager to immerse yourself in the electric trucking market, with a strong alignment to our values: reliability, sustainability, approachability, progressiveness, and a fast-paced work ethic.
Fluency in English is required; additional European languages are advantageous.



What We Offer:


The chance to join a purpose-driven company at a pivotal moment, with opportunities to shape our future.
A dynamic and supportive work environment with ample room for personal growth and development.
Comprehensive benefits, including a pension plan, unlimited vacation days, and flexible (hybrid) working arrangements.



Ready to Join Us? If you are passionate about shaping the future of sustainable transport and meet the above criteria, we encourage you to apply. Please submit your resum√© in English. At Milence, we value diversity and welcome applicants from all backgrounds.

Title: Data-analist
HTML:
Bij Roompot Landal GreenParks geloven we dat data de sleutel is tot nieuwe kansen en een katalysator voor innovatie. Door deel te nemen aan ons vooruitstrevende team, zullen jouw inzichten een cruciale rol spelen in het vormgeven van onze strategische initiatieven en het stimuleren van zakelijke groei. Als je enthousiast bent om jouw analytische expertise toe te passen in een dynamische omgeving, is deze rol op maat voor jou gemaakt.


De Data Analist bevordert data-gedreven besluitvorming door het analyseren, construeren en publiceren van inzichten met behulp van geavanceerde Business Intelligence-tools voor analyse, dashboards en rapportage. Deze rol fungeert als een brug tussen business en IT, vertaalt zakelijke vereisten naar IT (BI) oplossingen met behulp van diverse analyse- en rapportagetools. De Data Analist begrijpt en benut Landal-datasets, stelt standaarden en sjablonen vast en promoot de oplossingen bij de business en key users. De Data Analist rapporteert aan de Team Lead IT Application Development.


Daarnaast ontdekt en verkent de Data Analist kansen voor nieuwe inzichten door projectmatige samenwerking met de business, en zorgt zo voor verbeterde data-ge√Ønformeerde besluitvorming. Deze positie omvat zowel ontwikkelings- als adviesrollen.

Verder ben je verantwoordelijk voor:


  • Het verfijnen van user stories met betrekking tot de inzichten en rapporten die nodig zijn voor Landal Business Users, met focus op zowel strategische als tactische niveaus. De Business Users omvatten de Raad van Bestuur en afdelingsmanagement;
  • Het opstellen van rapporten en dashboards met behulp van geavanceerde tools om de nodige inzichten te bieden, volgens de agile werkwijze van het team;
  • Het adviseren van de Business Users over het gebruik en de interpretatie van analytische tools en resultaten;
  • Het promoten en uitleggen van dashboards en BI-oplossingen aan Business Users en Key Users;
  • Het introduceren en gebruiken van sjablonen en standaarden voor de Landal rapportage- en analyseomgeving;
  • Het identificeren en verkennen van kansen voor nieuwe inzichten;
  • Het mede verantwoordelijk zijn voor de optimale inrichting, effici√´nt gebruik en continue ontwikkeling van onze data- en analyseomgeving;
  • Het fungeren als schakel tussen IT en de business om nieuwe kansen te ontwikkelen en te implementeren.


Wat vragen wij:

  • Bachelor- of masterdiploma in een kwantitatief geori√´nteerd vakgebied zoals Informatica, Business Information Management, Computer Science, Engineering of een verwant vakgebied van een gerenommeerde instelling in Nederland of daarbuiten;
  • Kennis en ervaring met SQL, Data Modeling (Kimball) en Semantic Models is een harde eis;
  • Aantoonbare expertise als Data Analist, met een sterke achtergrond in het opvragen en analyseren van uitgebreide datasets;
  • In staat om effectief te communiceren met zowel business als IT, de behoeften en prioriteiten van beide te begrijpen en de communicatiekloof tussen hen te overbruggen. In staat om zakelijke behoeften te vertalen naar BI-oplossingen;
  • Bekwaam in het begrijpen en analyseren van kritische (complexe) data en vraagstukken door logisch redeneren, het identificeren van oorzaken, het leggen van verbindingen, het overwegen van verschillende perspectieven en het onderscheiden van hoofd- en bijzaken;
  • Sterke expertise in het bieden van analyse en rapportage met behulp van tools zoals Power BI, DBT, Databricks, Power Apps of vergelijkbaar;
  • Ervaring met het verbinden en benutten van data voor dashboarding, met begrip van dataverhoudingen;
  • Ervaring met het cre√´ren van uitgebreide bedrijfsrapporten en dashboards.


Wat wij bieden

  • Een jaarcontract met een proeftijd van een maand, met mogelijkheid tot vast dienstverband;
  • Bonusregeling;
  • 27 vakantiedagen, met de optie om 10 extra dagen bij te kopen;
  • Flexibele werktijden en mogelijkheden voor remote werken;
  • Thuiswerkvergoeding van ‚Ç¨2,35 per thuiswerkdag;
  • Reiskostenvergoeding van ‚Ç¨0,23 per kilometer, of volledige dekking voor openbaar vervoer;
  • Uitgebreide trainingsmogelijkheden, zowel online (150+ e-learnings) als offline;
  • Deelname aan het Recreatie Pensioenfonds, pensioenleeftijd 67 jaar, met premies gelijk verdeeld;
  • Betaald aanvullend ouderschapsverlof en zwangerschapsverlof;
  • Diverse collectieve verzekeringen, waaronder een doorlopende reisverzekering voor jou en je gezin;
  • Gunstige werknemerskorting op boekingen.


Roompot Landal GreenParks

Wij zijn Roompot Landal GreenParks, de marktleider in de vakantieparken- en recreatiebranche. Met meer dan 300 prachtige vakantieparken in 11 landen, bieden we een breed scala aan accommodaties, van vakantiehuizen en bungalows tot campings. Onze gezinsvriendelijke parken beschikken over uitgebreide recreatieve voorzieningen, sportactiviteiten, entertainment en eetgelegenheden. Ons doel is om gasten een onvergetelijke vakantie-ervaring te bieden in een prachtige, natuurlijke omgeving.

Title: Data Analyst - ‚Ç¨50/hour - Amsterdam

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
At BESTSELLER we are looking for a Data Analyst to join our international E-commerce team in Amsterdam or Aarhus.

BESTSELLER is one of Europe‚Äôs largest fashion companies with a wide variety of brands, including VERO MODA, ONLY, SELECTED and JACK & JONES. From Amsterdam, we support all BESTSELLER brands in growing and optimizing their E-commerce activities. You will be part of an open, dynamic, and international environment, where every day brings new and interesting challenges.

(Note: we would need you to be eligible to work in the EU for this job)

WHAT COULD YOU EXPECT FROM US?

As a Data Analyst in our team, you will act as a bridge between business and tech teams to drive data-driven decision-making. Hereby, you will gain experience in each step of the process, from collecting the data to delivering business insights.

At BESTSELLER E-Commerce we believe in freedom with responsibility, so we own what we do and how we develop ourselves.

WHAT DO WE NEED FROM YOU?

Responsibilities


Building reports and analyses to support various business teams (Performance Marketing, Consumer and Growth)
Presenting insights & recommendations to decision-makers
Translating business questions into analytical problems
Writing technical requirements and documentation


Desired Skills & Experience


3-5 years working experience in a similar role.
Advanced SQL (Google BigQuery), Google Analytics, experience with customer analytics, Power BI, and Excel skills.
Great communication skills, and ability to explain complex problems clearly.
Eagerness to learn new skills and share findings with the team.
Bachelor, master‚Äôs, or equivalent experience in a quantitative field (e.g. Economics, Business Analytics, Informatics, Finance or equivalent)
Capacity to thrive in a fast-paced environment, adapt quickly, work independently, and take ownership of your work.
We work with a wide array of technical systems so we‚Äôre looking for someone who enjoys learning new tools.
Fluency in English
Knowledge of an E-commerce business model.


Nice to have


Experience with Python
Snowflake and dbt
Dataform
Google Tag Manager


Our Benefits

We are a family-oriented company that takes care of its employees by offering different benefits such as:


Competitive salaries
50% discount on all BESTSELLER brands
Fit for less (tax benefit)
37 hours/week (full-time)
27 days of holidays + you can buy 5 more
Possibility to exchange the bank holidays
OpenUp for your wellbeing
Be part of our collective company insurance or a monthly allowance
Travel allowance
Flexible working times and a hybrid model
Catered lunch in the office
A culture of trust, autonomy, and continuous feedback that contributes to a positive impact.
Extensive onboarding
Plenty of opportunities and development


About BESTSELLER E-Commerce

At BESTSELLER, we are more than 15,000 people working for over 20 fashion brands such as JACK & JONES, SELECTED, VERO MODA, ONLY, PIECES, VILA, OBJECT, MAMALICIOUS, NAME IT, NOISY MAY and Y.A.S. At BESTSELLER E-Commerce, we are an international team of 170 people from more than 40 nationalities with the purpose to drive all e-commerce functions at BESTSELLER. With our office in the heart of Amsterdam as well as locations in Poland and Denmark, we are supporting all fashion brands of the BESTSELLER family and sell online in 15 countries around the world. We work in an environment where fashion meets technology. Challenging ourselves to offer the best experience to our customers and stakeholders and to work with the latest technologies is what drives us. As a team, we value autonomy and flexibility. We thrive in a flat organisation, where everyone has the chance to grow and learn. For more information, please go to www.bestseller.com.

Title: Data Analyst - Customer & Marketing
Description:
How do you delight our customers?

At bol.com, we are dedicated to making daily life more convenient for our over 13 million customers. As a Data Analyst within the Customer & Marketing domain, you‚Äôll play a critical role in analyzing customer behavior, uncovering insights and opportunities for improvement, and ultimately driving customer loyalty. You‚Äôll work closely with the rest of our Customer Analytics team to understand customer needs, evaluate the effectiveness of our marketing efforts, and identify new opportunities to enhance the customer experience.

Do you like solving complex puzzles within the customer and marketing domain? Do you have a passion for using data to drive business decisions? Just finished your studies and have a strong affinity for working with data and experience with SQL? Or looking for your next challenge after working as a data analyst for 1-3 years? Come join our team at bol.com as a Data Analyst within the Customer & Marketing domain.

What you do as a Data Analyst Customer & Marketing?

You‚Äôll join a group of data professionals in the Customer Analytics team, that aims to make people, programs, and products in the customer and marketing organization more performant through data. This job is for the versatile analyst, one that is equally comfortable talking to data as to stakeholders. Your days vary but at the core you‚Äôll use SQL/Tableau/dbt/git to provide metrics, datasets, analysis, and predictions that help the business make better decisions.

You‚Äôll collaborate with stakeholders across the organization to understand business needs, identify key performance metrics, and develop and deliver reports and dashboards that track performance and drive continuous improvement. Additionally, you‚Äôll play a critical role in identifying and evaluating new data sources, tools, and techniques that can help us better understand our customers and improve our marketing efforts.

Some Specific Responsibilities Include


Analyzing customer behavior and identifying key drivers of customer loyalty and marketing effectiveness. You'll use your analytical skills to uncover patterns and insights in our data that help us understand what drives customer loyalty and makes our marketing more effective, and you'll work with the rest of the Customer Analytics team to translate those insights into recommendations for improving the customer experience.
Developing high-quality data pipelines for dashboarding and KPIs. You'll work with our analytical engineers to create robust, efficient data pipelines using dbt, ensuring that the data we use for reporting and analysis is accurate, complete, and up-to-date.
Analyzing & prepping datasets for marketing efficiency and customer propositions. You'll work with our marketing teams to analyze the effectiveness of our marketing efforts, using data to identify opportunities for improvement marketing channels (like e-mail or push messages) and customer propositions (like Select)
Writing high-quality and easily interpretable SQL code that can be reused. You'll use your SQL skills to query large, complex datasets, extracting the data needed to answer key business questions. You'll also ensure that your SQL code is reusable, well-documented, and easily interpretable by other members of the team.
You'll work closely with stakeholders across the organization, using your data expertise to help guide decision-making processes and ensure that data-driven insights are at the forefront of our business strategy. You'll also represent the data perspective in cross-functional discussions, ensuring that our decisions are based on the best available information.


In this role, you‚Äôll have the opportunity to work with a variety of data sources and tools, and to collaborate closely with stakeholders across the organization. You‚Äôll be at the forefront of our efforts to understand and delight our customers, and you‚Äôll play a critical role in driving business impact through data-driven insights and recommendations.

Why you can make the difference?

You‚Äôre an enthusiastic team player who lives and breathes analytics. The ideal candidate for this role has a strong analytical mindset, a passion for customer-centricity, and excellent communication and collaboration skills. You have experience working with SQL and dashboarding tools like Tableau/Looker Studio and are comfortable navigating and analyzing large, complex datasets. You‚Äôre also able to work effectively with cross-functional teams, and have a knack for translating complex data insights into clear, actionable recommendations.

3 reasons why this is (not) for you Switch to find out


Discomfort working with data on a daily basis This role requires a strong analytical mindset and a willingness to work with large, complex datasets.
Prefer working independently over collaborating with others This role involves working closely with stakeholders across different teams and functions, so strong communication and collaboration skills are essential.
Lacking the technical skills required for the role You will be responsible for building data pipelines, creating dashboards, and conducting advanced analyses to drive business impact. If you are not open to getting technical and enjoy working more on the business side of things, this may not be the ideal fit for you.
A passion for data-driven problem solving and collaboration. You love working with data and are passionate about using data to drive business impact. You enjoy digging into complex datasets and using your analytical skills to uncover insights that help drive decision-making.
You enjoy collaborating with stakeholders across different teams and functions. You're a strong communicator who can translate technical information into non-technical language, and you enjoy working with others to drive projects forward.
Strong commitment to delivering high-quality analytics that drive business impact. You understand that data-driven insights are only valuable when they are accurate, reliable, and actionable. You are always striving for excellence in your work and take pride in the impact your insights have on the business.


This is where you‚Äôll work

Your new role will be part of the Customer Analytics team at bol.com, where you will collaborate with 6+ talented analytics professionals. Together, you will support a variety of teams across Product, Marketing, Strategy, and Finance, driving customer loyalty, growth, and profit for the company. The Customer Analytics team has a rich history at bol, and has built a modern data stack on the Google Cloud Platform, including technologies like BigQuery, Git, Airflow, dbt, and Tableau, as well as a range of Python libraries that enable advanced analytics. You‚Äôll be joining a team that is passionate about data and committed to quality, using cutting-edge tools and techniques to drive meaningful insights and business impact.

Communication During Vacation Period

It‚Äôs holiday season! This can make processing times longer.

It is our responsibility to enable an environment that unleashes the power of diversity.

Title: Data Analysis Intern
Description:
Job Description

Location: Amsterdam

Start Date: September

Duration: 6 months, full-time

Are you looking to make your mark on a platform that touches the lives of millions of people? Then you‚Äôre at the right place. It's an amazing time to help our growing and dynamic team expand globally.

We‚Äôre looking for a mathematical star who is eager to make a mark and kickstart their career at a Tech Scaleup. This position will work closely under the direction of our Senior Data Analyst by supporting the high-quality use of data, locating the right information, conducting quantitative analysis and sharing findings in a relevant format. Your work will help improve the quality of decision-making across key areas of the company.

Result Areas


Contribute to the Data team‚Äôs main initiatives, picking up analysis-intensive parts of key projects, so we take Inner Circle to the forefront of data tech.
Take up the role of ‚ÄúEmbedded Analyst‚Äù in projects around the company, supporting different departments with their data needs and being a go-to ‚Äúsource of truth‚Äù.
Carry out quickfire and ad-hoc analysis as needed, getting the right numbers through to colleagues in a timely fashion so everyone is making evidence-based calls.
Continually explore the data we generate, so we spot new and exciting opportunities for projects.
Develop as a data professional, so you gain familiarity with the technologies and processes used in a scale-up business.


Requirements

What will help you be successful:


You're a student enrolled in a BSc Or MSc degree in Maths, Engineering, data or econometrics, and this internship is a requirement for your degree.
You are competent in SQL
Collaboration, helping teams across the company thrive from a data-driven foundation
Clear Communication, making complex analysis simple for every stakeholder
Learning Quickly, adopting new tools and using them effectively


What We Offer


Compensation: A monthly internship compensation of ‚Ç¨600 (based on full-time hours).
Impact: The chance to make a life-changing impact on people‚Äôs lives.
Environment: The fun and hustle of a tech scale-up within a small but profitable company.
Team: A welcoming, authentic, humble, and fun team.
Office: A vibrant office space in the center of Amsterdam.
Perks: Regular team outings and dinners, and Inner Circle membership for you and your friends.


About Inner Circle

Inner Circle is less like a dating app, more like a member‚Äôs club made for dating. Niche by design, it‚Äôs for people who live ambitious, interesting lifestyles ‚Äì and want to date people who move in similar circles. Built on the belief that opposites don‚Äôt attract, a thorough application and screening process curates a community where everyone is worth dating ‚Äì and people have more in common than just being single.

The independent bootstrapped tech company ranked in the FT1000 2020 list as one of the fastest-growing companies in Europe. The company was also the winner of Deloitte‚Äôs Technology Fast 50 in The Netherlands in 2018.

At Inner Circle, we embrace our diverse community and team. We celebrate differences and know that they are key for helping us grow. Our team consists of 40 team members, with 16 nationalities and a female: male ratio of 60 : 40. Whatever your race, religion, colour, gender, national origin, political affiliation, sexual orientation, marital status, disability or age, we make sure everyone has the space to be themselves.

Sounds like your perfect match? Apply today!

Title: Data & BI Analist
HTML:
Data & BI Analist

Type vacature: Vast dienstverband

Locatie: Utrecht

  • Business Intelligence
  • Stakeholdermanagement
  • PowerBI ‚Äì Azure -SQL

Onze opdrachtgever is actief in de detachering. Binnen deze organisatie is een vacature van Data & BI Analist vacant. Als Data & BI-analist ben je verantwoordelijk voor het ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en implementeren van Business Intelligence (BI) oplossingen met behulp van Microsoft Azure. Je werkt nauw samen met verschillende belanghebbenden binnen de organisatie, zoals de IT-afdeling, business units en andere stakeholders, om de informatiebehoeften van de organisatie te identificeren en te vertalen naar effectieve BI-oplossingen.

Verantwoordelijkheden:

  • Ontwikkelen en implementeren van BI-oplossingen, zoals datawarehouses, data lakes, rapportages en dashboards met behulp van Azure Data Factory, Azure SQL Server, Power BI en andere relevante tools;
  • Analyseren van bedrijfsgegevens om trends, patronen en inzichten te identificeren die de besluitvorming ondersteunen en de bedrijfsprestaties verbeteren. Denk aan recruitment/marketing funnels, Financi√´le analyses, dashboarding & datamining ten behoeve van borging interne controles en beheersingsmaatregelen met betrekking tot facturatie en verloning;
  • Optimaliseren en onderhouden van bestaande BI-oplossingen om de prestaties en betrouwbaarheid te waarborgen;
  • Samenwerken met de IT-afdeling en andere belanghebbenden om ervoor te zorgen dat de BI-oplossingen voldoen aan de technische en functionele vereisten van de organisatie;
  • Continu bijleren en investeren in de nieuwste ontwikkelingen en trends op het gebied van BI en Azure-technologie√´n, en deze kennis toepassen om de BI-oplossingen te verbeteren en te innoveren.

Jouw Profiel:

  • Je hebt een afgeronde HBO of WO opleiding richting Bedrijfskunde, Informatica, Econometrie of Wiskunde;
  • Minimaal 3 jaar ervaring als BI-analist, waarbij ervaring met Azure een sterke pr√© is;
  • Kennis van Microsoft Azure-tools en -technologie√´n, zoals Azure Data Factory, Azure SQL Server en Power BI;
  • Ervaring met datawarehousing, data lakes, rapportages en dashboards;
  • Sterke analytische vaardigheden en het vermogen om complexe gegevens te interpreteren en inzichten te genereren;
  • Uitstekende communicatie- en samenwerkingsvaardigheden om effectief te kunnen samenwerken met verschillende belanghebbenden binnen de organisatie;
  • Proactieve houding en de mogelijkheid om zelfstandig te werken en projecten te beheren;
  • Certificeringen op het gebied van Azure en/of Business Intelligence zijn een pluspunt.

Ons aanbod:

  • Uitdagende, zelfstandige en afwisselende functie binnen een dynamische en groeiende organisatie;
  • Een salaris tussen de ‚Ç¨.3500,- en ‚Ç¨.5000,- per maand op basis van een fulltime dienstverband;
  • 30 vakantiedagen en een goede pensioenregeling;
  • Telefoon, laptop, Bonusregeling.
  • Veel vrijheid in je functie
  • Standplaats Utrecht

Reageren:

Scope Data & AI maakt graag kennis met jou! Neem gerust contact met ons op voor het stellen van vragen of het maken van een afspraak. Het telefoonnummer is 078 ‚Äì 8200 362.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
LocationUtrecht , NetherlandsBusiness SectorAIContact emailJob ref23549Published27 days ago

We are seeking a Data Analyst to join one of our clients in MedTech. The ideal candidate will be responsible for analyzing complex datasets, generating reports, and providing data-driven recommendations to support our healthcare initiatives.

Responsibilities


Analyze healthcare data to generate insights that drive clinical and business decisions.
Create reports and visualizations to communicate findings to stakeholders.
Collaborate with data scientists, engineers, and clinicians to ensure data accuracy and relevance.
Ensure compliance with healthcare data standards and regulations.
Contribute to continuous improvement of data processes and systems.



Qualifications


Proven experience as a Data Analyst, ideally within the healthcare or MedTech sector.
Strong proficiency in data analysis tools such as Excel, SQL, and data visualization platforms (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
Experience working with healthcare data and knowledge of healthcare data standards.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Strong communication skills with the ability to present data insights to non-technical stakeholders.
Professional proficiency in English.



Can this be interesting for you or anyone you know? If so, please send Gabriel Andrade: g.andrade@panda-int.com, your number/CV ASAP and I'll give you a call. Interviews will start next week.

Contract: FT

Location: Utrecht

Start Date: Immediately or by agreement

Title: ABN AMRO Traineeship - Data Analyst
HTML:
At a glance

As a data analyst trainee you will learn how to sift through data and seek to identify trends. What stories do the numbers tell? What business decisions can be made based on these insights? See yourself as a consultant between the data and a business line. As a data analyst you may also create visual representations, such as dashboards, charts and graphs to better showcase what the data reveals. With this Traineeship you will take the first step in your career as a data analyst to develop yourself personally and professionally!

Your job

  • Conduct consumer/business data research and analytics;
  • Extract actionable insights from large databases;
  • Perform recurring and ad hoc quantitative analysis to support day-to-day decision making;
  • Support reporting and analytics, such as KPIs, financial reports, and creating and improving dashboards;
  • Help translate data into visualizations, metrics, and goals.


Your profile

As a data analyst trainee you should have a degree in mathematics, statistics, physics, econometrics or business, with an analytics focus. You must have strong skills in math, science, programming, databases, modelling, and predictive analytics.

Who are you?

  • Entrepreneurial spirit, creative mind-set and capable of assessing and evaluating risks;
  • Knowledge of or at least interested in technology and how this supports business improvements;
  • Thrives in an international context;
  • Thinks in terms of what‚Äôs possible, sees opportunities and takes a solutions-oriented approach;
  • Self-starter who readily assumes responsibility;
  • You have a valid EU work permit.


What‚Äôs your experience?

  • Experience working with R or Python;
  • Experience working with SQL;
  • A strong combination of analytical skills, intellectual curiosity, and reporting skills;
  • Experience visualizing and presenting data, e.g. PowerBI;
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills;
  • A proactive approach, with an ability to manage multiple priorities simultaneously;
  • No more than 2 years of work experience (internships do not count as work experience), this is a graduate programme.


Nice to have:

  • A basic understanding of cloud technology;
  • A basic understanding of data mining techniques, emerging technologies (MapReduce, Spark, large-scale data frameworks, machine learning, neural networks);
  • Familiarity with the Agile methodology.


What We Offer

In our Data Traineeship, we prepare you to become a Data Expert who is not only relevant today but also prepared for the challenges of tomorrow and beyond. This program offers a balanced blend of professional and personal development training. Our commitment to your growth extends beyond the traineeship, as we continue to invest in your long-term career and provide guidance throughout your journey within the bank.

Moreover, our Data Strategy at ABN AMRO is focused on harnessing the power of data to drive insightful decision-making, enhance customer experiences, and maintain our competitive edge in the market. By integrating this strategy into our traineeship, we ensure that you not only gain practical skills but also understand the strategic importance of data in driving business success.

We are currently designing an entirely new program, so we can‚Äôt provide detailed specifics just yet. However, there‚Äôs no need to worry‚Äîexciting themes abound! Imagine engaging in enriching training sessions and masterclasses on cutting-edge topics like AI and Sustainability, as well as Leadership. You‚Äôll be supported by a coach and mentor to ensure you receive the guidance you need.

What‚Äôs more, you won‚Äôt be confined to just one department within the bank. We want you to experience the breadth of our organization, which is why you‚Äôll participate in multiple project rotations. This dynamic approach will allow you to gain a comprehensive understanding of our bank and develop a diverse skill set. Get ready for a journey filled with opportunities for growth, learning, and making meaningful contributions!

Interested?

Are you interested? Apply via the button above and upload your resume and cover letter. Do not apply for more than one position within the Data Traineeship, so choose between the Data Analyst and Data Scientist position. We are looking for graduates with a strong motivation to work for ABN AMRO. The Data Traineeship program starts in January 2025, it is possible to start working earlier with your team before the courses start in order to become acquainted with your new environment.

Selection process

After you apply you will receive an e-mail within 10 working days to let you know if you have been selected and can move forward to the next round. The overall recruitment process includes:

  • Apply online with your CV and cover letter;
  • CV screening by recruitment;
  • Online capacity test;
  • CV screening by hiring manager;
  • Online interview and case presentation by candidate;
  • Second interview;
  • Job offer.


If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at werkenbij@nl.abnamro.com.

Equal opportunities for all

The success of our organisation depends on the quality of our people and the ideas that they have. Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience. Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation. To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents, we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated.

Disclaimer external recruitment agencies

External recruitment agencies need to have a signed agreement with ABN AMRO BANK N.V., executed by a Talent Acquisition Specialist, when submitting a resume to a vacancy. In addition, a recruitment agency can only submit a resume when invited by a Talent Acquisition Specialist to join the search for a right candidate. All unsolicited resumes sent to us will be considered property of ABN AMRO BANK N.V. In this case, ABN AMRO will not be held liable to pay a placement fee.

Wij bieden

  • Een leergierige houding
  • Analytische skills

Title: Data-analist
Description:
De vraag naar onze consultants blijft stijgen, en daarom zijn we op zoek naar nieuwe collega‚Äôs die samen met ons de uitdaging willen aangaan. Ben jij klaar om de volgende stap in je carri√®re te zetten? Dit is jouw moment!




Wij zoeken gedreven professionals voor een vast dienstverband als Data Analist, vari√´rend van junior tot senior.




Als data analist bij Seventrees ben jij de sleutelspeler die proactief aan de slag gaat met het achterhalen van requirements, het verzamelen en valideren van data, allemaal op locatie bij onze klanten in een commerci√´le of bestuurlijke omgeving. Bij Seventrees hebben we het gevoel dat AI niet alleen een trend is, maar de toekomst. Daarom bieden we niet alleen uitdagende projecten, maar ook de mogelijkheid om bij te dragen aan de AI-revolutie door middel van advies en implementatie.




Wie zijn wij?

Seventrees is niet zomaar een consultancybedrijf; wij zijn gespecialiseerd in het leveren van hoogwaardige consultants op het gebied van business analyse, data-analyse & engineering, project-, programma- en interim-management. Onze opdrachten vari√´ren van grootbanken en pensioenfondsen tot nutsbedrijven, ICT-bedrijven, E-commerce en overheid. Wij zijn een organisatie met een heldere visie: oog voor onze medewerkers, de klant √©n de sociale aspecten van het werk. Bij Seventrees hebben we ervaren medewerkers met technische, business- en commerci√´le expertise, en we bieden een platte organisatie waarbij coachende partners de dagelijkse leiding hebben. Iedere medewerker krijgt een persoonlijke coach, en we koesteren regelmatige contactmomenten waarbij het nuttige en het aangename samenkomen. Wij bieden jou de kans om nieuwe ervaringen op te doen en stappen te maken in je carri√®re.




Wie ben jij?

Jij bent een enthousiaste professional met tussen de 2-5 jaar werkervaring, die graag out-of-the-box denkt en pragmatisch is ingesteld. Je bent gewend om actief feedback te geven en te ontvangen, en je hebt de ambitie om jezelf continu te ontwikkelen.

Als data-analist ben jij de spil in financi√´le processen, lever je informatie en inzichten via rapportages en dashboards en voorzie je de business van antwoorden op data-gerelateerde vragen. Jouw vaardigheden stellen je in staat om (complexe) data op een heldere manier te presenteren ter ondersteuning van besluitvorming. Daarnaast denk je actief mee over business rules en weet je waar je de benodigde data kunt vinden. Je gedijt in een constructieve samenwerking binnen een multidisciplinair team en begrijpt als geen ander de klantbeleving en -behoefte.




Herken je jezelf in dit profiel? Solliciteer dan direct! Voor meer informatie kun je contact opnemen met Hendrik Jan van Dijk, COO.




Kwalificaties

Minimaal HBO werk- en denkniveau.
Minimaal 2 jaar ervaring als Data Analist.
Ervaring met SQL-server en advanced Excel.
Ervaring met SAS Enterprise Guide, Cognos Analytics of vergelijkbare reporting tools zoals Power BI of Business Objects.
Kennis van Python of andere talen is een pr√©.
Uitmuntende communicatieve vaardigheden in het Nederlands en Engels, zowel in woord als geschrift.
Analytisch sterk en flexibel.
Zelfstandig, ondernemend en goed in staat vooruit te plannen.
Kennis van datawarehouse concepten en data modelleringstechnieken.
Ervaring met verzamelen, ophalen, ordenen en inlezen van relevante data en controleren op correctheid.
Ontwikkelen van datamodellen.
Opstellen van rapportages, conclusies en aanbevelingen.
Initi√´ren en vormgeven van onderzoeken.
Verrichten van kwantitatieve en kwalitatieve onderzoeken.
Het proactief opzoeken van en afstemmen met de stakeholders.
Uitbrengen van advies aan het management

Title: Data Analyst Consultant
Description:
Data Analyst ‚Äì Digital Power

Locatie: Nederland (minimaal 1 dag per week op kantoor of bij de klant)

Salaris: ‚Ç¨2.800 ‚Äì ‚Ç¨6.500 (afhankelijk van ervaring, inclusief vakantietoeslag)




Ben jij een Data Analyst die graag werkt aan uiteenlopende projecten en zich wil ontwikkelen in een dynamische consultancy-omgeving?

Sluit je aan bij een jong en gespecialiseerd team dat data transformeert tot waardevolle inzichten voor topklanten zoals IKEA, KLM, en Rabobank.




Het Bedrijf

Onze klant is een innovatieve consultancy, gespecialiseerd in data analytics, data engineering en data services. Met een sterke focus op samenwerking, kennisdeling en persoonlijke ontwikkeling, biedt het bedrijf een omgeving waarin je kunt groeien en je vaardigheden kunt aanscherpen. Werken in verschillende branches en projecten houdt het werk afwisselend en uitdagend. De cultuur binnen het bedrijf wordt gekenmerkt door een open sfeer waarin collega‚Äôs elkaar versterken en ondersteunen.




De Rol

Als Data Analyst werk je met verschillende klanten om data om te zetten in bruikbare inzichten. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het cre√´ren van dashboards, het opbouwen van rapporten en het beheren van stakeholders en projectplannen.




Belangrijkste Verantwoordelijkheden:

Data omzetten in inzichten voor verschillende klanten.
Dashboards en rapporten bouwen om bedrijfsdoelstellingen te ondersteunen.
Beheren van stakeholderrelaties en projectplannen opstellen.
Samenwerken met diverse teams om de beste resultaten te behalen.




Technische Stack: Google Analytics, Power BI, SQL, Tableau




Vaardigheden en Ervaring

Minimaal 2 jaar ervaring als Data Analyst.
Ervaring met het bouwen van dashboards en rapporten.
Sterke communicatievaardigheden voor effectief stakeholdermanagement.
Interesse in persoonlijke groei en ontwikkeling binnen een consultancyomgeving.




Benefits

Salaris van ‚Ç¨2.800 ‚Äì ‚Ç¨6.500, afhankelijk van ervaring.
Onbeperkt opleidingsbudget voor professionele ontwikkeling.
Volledig gedekte pensioenbijdrage in het eerste jaar.
Langdurige projecten van ongeveer een jaar voor een stabiele werkomgeving.




Klaar om de volgende stap in je carri√®re te zetten? Solliciteer nu en word onderdeel van een team dat vooroploopt in data-gedreven oplossingen!

Title: Senior Analyst - Consumer Data
Description:
Who We Are:

Since 1906, New Balance has empowered people through sport and craftsmanship to create positive change in communities around the world. We innovate fearlessly, guided by our core values and driven by the belief that conventions were meant to be challenged. We foster a culture in which every associate feels welcomed and respected, where leaders and creatives are inspired to shape the world of tomorrow by taking bold action today. At New Balance, We Got Now.

This role will leverage our customer data warehouse, providing analytics solutions to a range of stakeholders including eCommerce, marketing, retail, planning and allocation, and strategy. Working alongside a digital analytics specialist, this role will identify new segmentation opportunities and help execute deployment across the marketing technology stack. The Sr Analyst will also be responsible for demand reporting within DTC channels and identify opportunities to improve the flow of data between systems, onboarding new sources and tools where necessary and coordinating with privacy and legal to ensure GDPR compliance.

JOB MISSION:

The Senior Analyst, Consumer Analytics will be responsible for analytics projects and customer data initiatives that leverage first-party consumer insights to drive regional business operations.

This role will leverage our customer data warehouse, providing analytics solutions to a range of stakeholders including eCommerce, marketing, retail, planning and allocation, and strategy. Working alongside a digital analytics specialist, this role will identify new segmentation opportunities and help implement deployment across the marketing technology stack. The senior analyst will also be responsible for demand reporting within DTC channels and finding opportunities to improve the flow of data between systems, onboarding new sources and tools where necessary, and coordinating with privacy and legal to ensure GDPR compliance.

MAJOR ACCOUNTABILITIES:


Conduct analyses of existing first-party customer data to deepen our connection with consumers and drive segmentation opportunities.
Work with regional partners and a global IT team to improve capabilities of customer data capture, data warehousing, and actionability of data strategy.
Create automated reporting solutions that enable more efficient ways of working for regional eCommerce teams (trading, marketing, operations).
Validate and coordinate data flows within the marketing technology stack including data warehouse, CDP, and CRM systems.
Identify new opportunities to solve regional challenges with existing customer data, and roadmap solutions to incorporate new customer data where necessary.
Translate complex analytics principles into concise, clear, and actionable outcomes.


REQUIREMENTS FOR SUCCESS:


Several years of professional experience in consumer insights, digital analytics, or business intelligence.
Strong analytical, financial, and problem-solving skills. Highly comfortable with demonstrating data to drive decisions and tell a story.
Foundational knowledge of predictive and statistical modelling techniques to segment customer data and experience using Python or R for statistical analysis.
Experience with PowerBI and DAX/M to create dashboards and reports.
Command of SQL and principles of database architecture required, with experience in Snowflake and BigQuery preferred.
Experience with a modern digital marketing technology stack.
Experience working with partners at multiple levels within an organization (operations, marketing, finance, privacy, etc.).
Willing to take action self-starter who can set strategy and drive execution with a ‚Äúroll up the sleeves‚Äù approach.
Ability to translate business challenges into analytics projects and communicate insights to key partners.
Bachelor‚Äôs degree, preferably in Business Analytics, Economics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Marketing, or a related field.
Passionate about the brand with a deep appreciation for the product and understanding of the customer‚Äôs experience.


BENEFITS:


Discretionary Bonus Opportunity
Discount on the health insurance
8% holiday allowance
Flexible Working Hours
Pension Scheme
25 days Annual Leave per year
Up to ‚Ç¨250 travel allowance each month
Hybrid working
Employee Discount
Work from-home allowance
Home working equipment
Sports subscription via OneFit
Opportunity to work abroad for four weeks per year
Wellbeing and Mental Health Benefit (24/7 Employment Assistance Program & Support)


Equal Opportunity Employer:

New Balance is committed to equality of opportunity for all current and prospective associates regardless of age, disability, race, religion or belief, gender, sexual orientation, pregnancy and maternity, marriage and civil partnership and gender reassignment. We are an equal opportunity employer and support a culture of diversity and inclusion.

If you have not already done so, please let us know if you require any support so we can make the right adjustments and considerations should they be required.
